participant_1.background:
I am a powerlifter who loves the cold.
I like to read the news and write my own stories.
I went to the beach with my family and boyfriend last summer.
i have one grandson and one daughter.
i work in a circus as a juggler.

participant_2.background:
I've been with my partner for five years.
i m terrible at math.
I am a software engineer who loves Halloween and pasta.
I watch Face Off with my husband in our spare time.
I have a cat and he is the light of my life.

content.text: Hi, I'm a powerlifter who loves the cold. What about you?
I'm a software engineer who loves Halloween and pasta. How do you like being a powerlifter?
It's a lot of fun! I love the feeling of being strong and lifting heavy things.
I bet! I wish I was stronger. I'm terrible at math, so I don't think I would be very good at powerlifting.
You don't have to be good at math to be a powerlifter! It's all about practice and dedication.
I guess you're right! Maybe I'll give it a try someday.
I'd love to see you lift!
Thanks! I'll let you know if I ever decide to try it.
Sounds good! In the meantime, I'll be over here lifting heavy things and enjoying the cold.
Have fun! I'll be watching Face Off with my husband and cat.
Sounds like a great way to spend a night
